item.title: Download Files in Windows
item.description: Using Invoke-WebRequest linkWe can use Invoke-WebRequest command # In PowerShell Invoke-WebRequest -Uri https://example.com/hello.txt -Outfile .\hello.txt IWR -Uri https://example.com/hello.txt -Outfile .\hello.txt # In CMD, we need to call `powershell` or `powershell.exe` command. powershell Invoke-WebRequest -Uri https://example.com/hello.txt -Outfile .\hello.txt powershlel IWR -Uri https://example.com/hello.txt -Outfile .\hello.txt
